nbdev-proteomics
================

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

A collection of utilities to process proteomics data

## Install

``` sh
pip install nbdev_proteomics
```

## How to use

Letâ€™s start by uploading a dataset from a DIA-NN analysis
